title: Any guesses on this famous font?
content:
My client wants to use this font, but not sure what font this is. I’m sure it’s a pretty basic font and it’s just slanted and resized for effect. please help if you can. Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080909074245/http:/typophile.com/files/font_105.jpg) | 18.42 KB |

 [‹ Any guesses (BIG Letter Typeface)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080909074245/http:/typophile.com/node/49147 "Go to previous forum topic") [handwriting font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080909074245/http:/typophile.com/node/49144 "Go to next forum topic")
author: walden1974

comments.content: Right on Jan...thank you so much for the help. It was hell getting it too look close to that logo and I think I did alright. It’s funny how many of these titles and logos out there are just simple fonts. Thanks again Jan.
